messages.subject: Re: Re: Xmas - PC or Not PC, that is the question.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/29/99 4:25:28 PM !!!First Boot!!!, megates@juno.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/29/99 4:25:28 PM !!!First Boot!!!, megates@...
writes:

<< The *correct* answer is to shop at locally owned stores stocked with
locally made products. My dilemma is my budget. >>


Yeah, that nasty old reality keeps cropping up here too! I am finding that
this is yet another thing that I may or may not be so PC about. Yes, I like
the cute little Xmas tree stand in our cute little town. But Home Depot just
advertised Xmas trees for 1/2 the price. That $25-30 buys a lot of gifts for
my kids at the Dollar store. So I will be a "bad person" and buy from Home
Depot.

Nance
